meanings.definition: Lack of justice or moral uprightness.
meanings.sent1: The unrighteousness of the corrupt politician was exposed by the media.
meanings.sent2: The community came together to fight against the unrighteousness in the legal system.
meanings.sent3: The unrighteousness of the greedy businessman led to his downfall.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of unrighteousness, it is important to stand up for what is right.
meanings.sent5: The unrighteousness of the dictator's regime could not be ignored.

meanings.sent1: The preacher spoke out against the unrighteousness of the sinful actions.
meanings.sent2: The book depicted a battle between righteousness and unrighteousness.
meanings.sent3: The unrighteousness of eating dessert before dinner was a delicious rebellion.
meanings.sent4: Her heart was heavy with the burden of unrighteousness she carried.
meanings.sent5: The unrighteousness of the villain was evident in every evil deed.
